TopicTitle: Can OBS put recordings in anything else than .flv?

Articles.Content: I would like to know if OBS can do anything else than .flv? I really don't like .flv.

Yeah, it should be able to do .mp4 through the builtin x264 encoder.

EDIT: Oh, I think you're using OBS Studio. In that case, no; you have to put the flv file through ffmpeg to output it to mp4.

Edited January 2, 2015 by longbyte1
